Question ID 952 – Metrics – rounding and decimals; materiality of
information
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
To how many decimals should a percentage be rounded? And for other datapoints that ask for a
‘decimal’, how many decimals are expected?
ESRS Reference
All numerical datapoints required by ESRS
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 44 of 278
